data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Koroška to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Koroška, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the 147 believers in Koroška to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 70,653 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Koroška, Slovenia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Koroška, Slovenia.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Koroška. Through your servants plant 14 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Dravograd
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Dravograd, Koroška, Slovenia.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Koroška, Slovenia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 70,800 citizens of the the state of Koroška.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Koroška access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
